title: Lizards
description: Another fascinating close-up look at the wonders of the natural world from Sibert Honor photographer Nic Bishop.With breathtaking full-page images, including a double-gatefold spread, Sibert-Honor photographer Nic Bishop introduces the beauty and diversity of lizards.The simple, engaging text presents both basic information and fun, quirky facts about the appearance, habits, and life cycle of these amazing reptiles. An index and glossary are included.
author: Nic Bishop
